name: Dr. Evelyn Thorne
role: CEO of Prometheus Space Industries - Corporate player with hidden agenda
core_wound: Brilliant physicist who abandoned pure research when funding dried up. Built a corporate empire but lost her scientific soul. Resents that money bought her influence while talent didn't.
wants: To monopolize alien technology for corporate advantage - to win the new space race
needs: To remember why she loved science before it became about profit - to choose knowledge over power
voice_markers: Disarms with self-aware jokes about being 'the villain'
Shifts between scientific precision and business vagueness strategically
Uses compliments as manipulation ('Someone as smart as you must see...')
Rare moments of genuine scientific enthusiasm break through the corporate mask
contradiction: Still loves pure science but can't admit it without destroying her power base. Wants to be seen as pragmatic but haunted by idealism.
physical_description: Impeccably styled, designer business wear, expensive minimalist jewelry. Warm smile that doesn't reach calculating eyes. Commanding presence.

relationships.Marcus Reid: Sees valuable asset to acquire or neutralize - but curious about his mind
relationships.Director Kessler: Uneasy alliance - both want control but different end goals
